p: Of the 27 patients who underwent a kidney transplant, 21 (78 %) patients lived 5 years, of those 17 (63 %) patients with functional graft. One patient (4 %) had primary afunctional graft and in three patients (11 %) rejection occurred (3, 15 and 41 months). Six patients (22 %) died after their kidney transplants, 1 patient with functional graft, 1 patient had primary afunctional graft and 4 (15 %) patients had rejection (1, 12, 44 and 56 months). The two patients with liver transplants lived 5 years with functional graft.
